EnvironmentContext.description: Represents an environment context for feature flag evaluation.
EnvironmentContext.title: EnvironmentContext

IdentityContext.description: Represents an identity context for feature flag evaluation.

identifier.description: The unique identifier for the identity, used for segment and multivariate feature flag targeting.
identifier.title: Identifier

traits.description: A map of traits associated with the identity, where the key is the trait name and the value is the trait value.
traits.title: Traits

IdentityContext.title: IdentityContext

description:
Represents a context object containing the necessary information
to evaluate Flagsmith feature flags for a given environment,
(optionally) identity, feature, and segments.
title: EvaluationContext
